Events that occurred on 9 December.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1932 - Author and interviewer Jan Broberg is born.
1943 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 53.
1956 - The fourth episode of 1956 radio series of The Lord of the Rings airs on the BBC Third Programme.
1959 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 222.
1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to William McCullam.
1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Jane Dixon.
1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Miss Jaworski.
1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Christine Jones.
2013 - The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack is released.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Frodo and Samwise rest in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
